attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please may you allow the asylum seekers to work.most of them are hard working, educated,highly skilled people.by allowing them to work,they will be contributing to the economy{PAYE/N.I.contribution}as it is now they are not productive,they drain the state in terms of finacial support-food,accomodation ,etc.the state is losing millions per year in looking after these people.let them be allowed to work and be productive.some have cases that have been pending for 10years and how much has the state lost on this?please reconsider the Government policy on Immigration.
